narrative.title: 2Nd New Zealand Division - 1941Q1
narrative.situation: British Commonwealth Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1941Q1.
narrative.objectives: Premier Commonwealth infantry division optimized for mobile desert warfare and defensive operations
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

supply.notes: Division well-supplied in Egypt January 1941; severe shortages developed during Greece/Crete campaigns March-May 1941

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Highly aggressive infantry tactics with emphasis on night attacks
Strong esprit de corps from volunteer force

supply_states.notes: Division well-supplied in Egypt January 1941; severe shortages developed during Greece/Crete campaigns March-May 1941
